title: Clear cutting increases nitrates in streams

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to occur in a forested region that has been recently clear-cut?

choices.label: The concentration of nitrates in streams running through the region will increase.
The average depth of topsoil will increase.
The water temperature in streams running through the region will decrease.
Volume of runoff after rains will decrease.
The frequency of landslides will decrease.

content.answer: The concentration of nitrates in streams running through the region will increase.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
